cmp: 合 (one-tenth of a peck, Chinese musical note/fit/to join)
mng: to hold, to seize, to catch, to apprehend, to take, (used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)

exm.mng: to take out, to put out, to provide, to put forward (a proposal), to come up with (evidence)
to grasp, (dialect) affecting shyness, coy, to create difficulties
tui na (form of Chinese manual therapy)
to arrest, to catch a criminal
variant of 拿破崙|拿破仑[Na2 po4 lun2]
